  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>4240</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Nave</string>
            <string language="en">Ship</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schiff</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bateau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Navio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σκάφος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Nave</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Clicca sui quadrati e cerca di localizzare la nave pirata cliccando il meno possibile.</string>
            <string language="en">Click in the squares and try to locate the pirates ship with as few clicks as possible.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">nave da guerra</string>
            <string language="en">battleship</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klicken Sie in den Quadraten und der Versuch, zum 
der Piraten zu lokalisieren versenden mit als wenig Klicken, wie 
möglich.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cliquez dans les places et l'essai pour 
localiser les pirates se transportent avec en tant que peu de 
clics comme possibles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estale nos quadrados e a tentativa para encontrar 
os piratas envía com como poucos cliques como possíveis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χτυπήστε στα τετράγωνα και προσπαθήστε να εντοπίσετε 
το σκάφος πειρατών με ως όσο το δυνατόν λιγότερα στιγμιαία 
πατήματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Haga clic en los cuadrados y el intento para 
localizar a los piratas envía con como pocos tecleos como sea 
posible.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Linienschiff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cuirassé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cruzador de batalha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θωρηκτό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">acorazado</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
